Jollification is the third album by The Lightning Seeds. All songs
were written by Ian Broudie, with contributions on some tracks from
Alison Moyet, Ian McNabb and Terry Hall.

Four tracks from the album were released as singles in the UK:
"Lucky You", "Marvellous", "Change" and "Perfect". The album attracted
positive reviews. It peaked at number 12 in the UK Albums Chart, and
gained platinum certification in December 1995.
